div.h2: South Bronx Charter School For International Cultures & the Arts

p.span: At SBCSICA, students acquire a genuine love of learning as they progress through our inquiry-based dual language program. Learning is active and draws from a range of experiences, from class investigations to museum visits. The curriculum employs critical thinking skills and strategies where students learn to ask questions, take risks and think both creatively and analytically. Curriculum experiences not only nurture children’s curiosity and imagination, they prepare them with the foundation skills, knowledge and competencies critical for them to be successful as the 21st century citizens.

span.br: Our core curriculum also includes daily enrichment through the Arts. From Kindergarten through Fifth grade, students explore art mediums such as drawing, painting, and sculpture while learning about different artists, art careers, and techniques.​
